meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elaine Golden Richard Sprow Chris McKillop Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1043.

td.p: Elaine Golden, a law student from Newtonville, Massachusetts
Richard Sprow, a college English professor from Newcastle, Pennsylvania
Chris McKillop, a management consultant from Toronto, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,801)

tr.td: FOREIGN CURRENCY
FLOWERS
HEALTH & NUTRITION
POTENT POTABLES
1850s HITS
